name: VIDEO: County Debuts Lifesaving Knox Box Program
description: County emergency responders have a new tool to help keep homeowners in unincorporated areas safe during a wildfire or medical emergency. It’s called a Knox Box and when it comes to being prepared for disaster… this may be just the key.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
County emergency responders have a new tool to help keep homeowners in unincorporated areas safe during a wildfire or medical emergency. It’s called a Knox Box and when it comes to being prepared for disaster… this may be just the key.
Contact us to see if you qualify.
Call – 858-974-5744
Email – FireCRR@sdcounty.ca.gov
Visit – sandiegocounty.gov/sdcfa
